item.title: About ambition, dedication and balance
item.description: Translation of Zen Jaskiniowca article About ambition, dedication and balance You may or may not like Ayn Rand, but the success that she has achieved is astronomical.

item.title: About the harmfulness of compassion and pity
item.description: Translation of Zen Jaskiniowca article About the harmfulness of compassion and pity When I say aloud, that one of the most important characteristic for everyone who wants to achieve anything is ruthlessness, people see me like as a psychopath and Adolf Hitler of coaching.
